content:
Hi Folks, we are having an important All-Hands meeting Thursday July 9 at 9 am Eastern US time (click link to join).
Agenda:
1) FSH ballot reconciliation progress report
2) Discuss possible syntax for nested array indexing
3) Tooling development plans: FSH School, Go FSH, and FSH Playground
4) Help us with prioritizing post-1.0 tooling features
Hope to see a good turnout tomorrow!
I'll be there - even though it is 7am my time :)

David Hay said:

1am my time. I'm dedicated, but...

Just stay up late...
We have been recording the meetings. They are linked to the HL7 confluence page. Inputs can come after.
We are going to build anything that is a good enough pun. FSH Scales == a musical app for FSH?
Meeting minutes (which include a recording) for anyone who is interested but was unable to attend: https://confluence.hl7.org/display/FHIRI/FHIR+Shorthand+Minutes+2020-07-09

Please join our monthly FSH/SUSHI conference call tomorrow, Thursday October 8 at 9-10 am Eastern US time. We will be focusing on the SUSHI 1.0 release.
Join Microsoft Teams Meeting
+1 540-492-5664 United States, Roanoke (Toll)
Conference ID: 889 990 654#
